mode.name: errataqueue_find_candidates
mode.query: SELECT eq.errata_id, E.org_id, EQ.channel_id FROM rhnErrataQueue EQ inner join rhnErrata E on E.id = EQ.errata_id inner join rhnChannel C on C.id = EQ.channel_id WHERE C.label not in ( select channel_label from rhnRepoRegenQueue) ORDER BY next_action DESC

mode.name: daily_summary_queue_batch
mode.query: SELECT org_id FROM rhnDailySummaryQueue

mode.name: users_in_org_wanting_reports
mode.query: SELECT WC.id, WUPI.email as address, WC.login FROM WEB_USER_PERSONAL_INFO WUPI, rhnUserInfo UI, rhnWebContactEnabled WC WHERE WC.org_id = :org_id AND WC.id = UI.user_id AND UI.email_notify = 1 AND WC.id = WUPI.web_user_id

mode.name: users_awol_servers
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT S.id, S.name, SI.checkin FROM rhnServer S, rhnServerInfo SI, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = SI.server_id AND date_diff_in_days(SI.checkin, current_timestamp) BETWEEN 1 AND (1 + :checkin_threshold) AND SI.server_id = S.id AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM rhnUserServerPrefs WHERE user_id = :user_id AND server_id = S.id AND name = 'include_in_daily_summary' AND value = '0' ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_daily_summary') ORDER BY CHECKIN DESC

mode.name: get_action_info
mode.query: SELECT AT.name as type, AStat.name as status, COUNT(SA.server_id) as count, E.advisory_name AS ADVISORY, E.synopsis AS SYNOPSIS FROM rhnActionStatus AStat, rhnActionType AT, rhnAction A LEFT OUTER JOIN rhnActionErrataUpdate AEU ON A.id = AEU.action_id LEFT OUTER JOIN rhnErrata E ON AEU.errata_id = E.id, rhnServerAction SA, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE USP.user_id = :user_id AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM rhnUserServerPrefs WHERE user_id = :user_id AND server_id = USP.server_id AND name = 'include_in_daily_summary' AND value = '0' ) AND EXISTS ( select 1 from rhnServerFeaturesView sfv where sfv.server_id = usp.server_id and sfv.label = 'ftr_daily_summary') AND USP.server_id = SA.server_id AND date_diff_in_days(SA.modified, current_timestamp) > 0 AND date_diff_in_days(SA.modified, current_timestamp) < 1 AND SA.status = AStat.id AND SA.action_id = A.id AND A.action_type = AT.id GROUP BY AT.name, AStat.name, E.advisory_name, E.synopsis

write-mode.name: errataqueue_enqueue_sat_errata
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnErrataNotificationQueue (errata_id, org_id, next_action, channel_id) SELECT DISTINCT :errata_id, wc.id, current_timestamp + numtodsinterval(:minutes, 'minute'), :channel_id FROM web_customer wc, rhnChannelErrata CE WHERE CE.errata_id = :errata_id and not exists (select q2.errata_id from rhnErrataNotificationQueue Q2 where Q2.errata_id = :errata_id and Q2.channel_id = :channel_id and Q2.org_id = wc.id)

write-mode.name: errataqueue_dequeue_errata_notification
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnErrataNotificationQueue WHERE errata_id = :errata_id AND channel_id = :channel_id

write-mode.name: errataqueue_dequeue_errata
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnErrataQueue WHERE errata_id = :errata_id AND channel_id = :channel_id

mode.name: errataqueue_find_autoupdate_servers
mode.query: select distinct s.id as server_id , s.org_id from rhnServerNeededCache snc join rhnServer s on s.id = snc.server_id where snc.channel_id = :channel_id and snc.errata_id = :errata_id and upper(s.auto_update) = 'Y' and exists (select 1 from rhnServerFeaturesView sfv where sfv.server_id = S.id and sfv.label = 'ftr_auto_errata_updates') order by s.org_id

mode.name: repomd_driver_query
mode.query: SELECT distinct channel_label FROM rhnRepoRegenQueue WHERE next_action is not null

mode.name: repomd_details_query
mode.query: SELECT id, channel_label, client, reason, force, bypass_filters, next_action FROM rhnRepoRegenQueue queue WHERE next_action is null and channel_label = :channel_label

write-mode.name: repomd_mark_in_progress
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnRepoRegenQueue set next_action=null, modified=current_timestamp WHERE channel_label = :channel_label

write-mode.name: repomd_clear_in_progress
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnRepoRegenQueue set next_action=current_timestamp, modified=current_timestamp WHERE next_action is null

write-mode.name: repomd_dequeue
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnRepoRegenQueue WHERE channel_label = :channel_label and next_action is null

mode.name: kickstartcleanup_find_candidates
mode.query: SELECT KS.id, KSS.label, KS.action_id, KS.new_server_id, KS.old_server_id FROM rhnKickstartSession KS, rhnKickstartSessionState KSS WHERE KS.state_id = KSS.id AND ((KSS.label NOT IN ('created', 'complete', 'failed') AND KS.last_action < current_timestamp - interval '1' day) OR (KSS.label = 'created' AND KS.last_action < current_timestamp - interval '6' day)) AND (KS.kickstart_mode != 'default_session' OR KS.kickstart_mode is NULL)

mode.name: kickstartcleanup_find_parent_action
mode.query: SELECT ACT.prerequisite FROM rhnAction ACT WHERE ACT.id = :action_id

mode.name: kickstartcleanup_find_failed_state_id
mode.query: SELECT KSS.id FROM rhnKickstartSessionState KSS WHERE KSS.label = 'failed'

write-mode.name: kickstartcleanup_mark_session_failed
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnKickstartSession SET state_id = :failed_state_id, action_id = NULL WHERE id = :session_id

write-mode.name: taskomatic_time_series_data_cleanup
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM time_series_data tsd WHERE tsd.probe_id in ( SELECT tsp.id FROM time_series_purge tsp WHERE tsp.deleted = 1 )

write-mode.name: taskomatic_state_change_cleanup
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM state_change sc WHERE sc.o_id in ( SELECT tsp.id || '' FROM time_series_purge tsp WHERE tsp.deleted = 1 )

write-mode.name: taskomatic_probe_state_cleanup
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhn_probe_state rps WHERE rps.probe_id in ( SELECT tsp.id FROM time_series_purge tsp WHERE tsp.deleted = 1 )

write-mode.name: taskomatic_package_changelog_cleanup
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnPackageChangeLogData WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT changelog_data_id FROM rhnPackageChangeLogRec )

mode.name: taskomatic_task_status
mode.query: SELECT t.name, r.id, r.start_time, r.status FROM (SELECT ta.id as task_id, max(ru.start_time) as st FROM rhnTaskoTask ta, rhnTaskoTemplate te, rhnTaskoRun ru WHERE ru.org_id is null AND ru.status != 'SKIPPED' AND ru.template_id = te.id AND ta.id = te.task_id GROUP BY ta.id) se, rhnTaskoRun r, rhnTaskoTask t, rhnTaskoTemplate e WHERE r.start_time = se.st AND t.id = se.task_id AND r.template_id = e.id AND t.id = e.task_id ORDER BY t.name

mode.name: pkgcleanup_find_deleted_pkgs
mode.query: SELECT PFDQ.path FROM rhnPackageFileDeleteQueue PFDQ

mode.name: summarypop_awol_server_in_orgs2
mode.query: select distinct sg.org_id as id from rhnServerGroup sg, rhnServerGroupType sgt where SGT.label IN ('enterprise_entitled', 'provisioning_entitled') AND SGT.id = SG.group_type AND SG.max_members > 0 and sg.org_id in ( select s.org_id from rhnServer s, rhnServerINfo si where s.id = si.SERVER_ID AND date_diff_in_days(SI.checkin, current_timestamp) BETWEEN 1 AND (1 + :checkin_threshold))

mode.name: summarypop_orgs_recent_actions
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT S.org_id as id FROM rhnServer S, rhnServerAction SA, rhnServerGroup SG, rhnServerGroupType SGT WHERE SGT.label IN ('enterprise_entitled', 'provisioning_entitled') AND SGT.id = SG.group_type AND SG.max_members > 0 AND SG.org_id = S.org_id AND S.id = SA.server_id AND SA.modified between current_timestamp - interval '1' day and current_timestamp

mode.name: verify_summary_queue
mode.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as queued FROM rhnDailySummaryQueue WHERE org_id = :org_id

mode.name: find_sandbox_file_candidates
mode.query: SELECT CF.id FROM rhnConfigFile CF WHERE CF.config_channel_id IN (SELECT cc.Id FROM rhnConfigChannel CC WHERE CC.created < current_timestamp - numtodsinterval(:window, 'day') AND CC.confchan_type_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnConfigChannelType WHERE label = 'server_import'))

mode.name: find_sandbox_channel_candidates
mode.query: SELECT CC.id FROM rhnConfigChannel CC WHERE CC.created < current_timestamp - numtodsinterval(:window, 'day') AND CC.confchan_type_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnConfigChannelType WHERE label = 'server_import')

mode.name: erratamailer_find_errata
mode.query: SELECT enq.errata_id, enq.org_id, enq.channel_id FROM rhnErrataNotificationQueue ENQ WHERE (enq.next_action < current_timestamp + numtodsinterval(:threshold, 'minute')) ORDER BY next_action DESC

write-mode.name: erratamailer_mark_errata_done
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnErrataNotificationQueue SET next_action = NULL WHERE errata_id = :errata_id AND org_id = :org_id and channel_id = :channel_id

mode.name: erratamailer_get_relevant_servers
mode.query: select distinct s.id as server_id, s.name, s.release, sa.name as arch, urn.user_id from rhnServerNeededCache snc join rhnServer s on snc.server_id = s.id join rhnServerArch sa on s.server_arch_id = sa.id join rhnUserReceiveNotifications urn on urn.server_id = snc.server_id where snc.errata_id = :errata_id and snc.channel_id = :channel_id and s.org_id = :org_id

mode.name: erratamailer_get_userinfo
mode.query: SELECT wc.id, wc.org_id, wc.login, wupi.email FROM web_user_personal_info wupi, web_contact wc WHERE wupi.web_user_id = wc.id AND wc.id = :user_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_channel_packages
mode.query: SELECT p.id, pn.name as name, pevr.epoch as epoch, pevr.version as version, pevr.release as release, p.summary, p.description, pa.label as arch_label, p.build_time, p.path, p.package_size, p.payload_size, p.installed_size, p.copyright, p.vendor, p.build_host, p.header_start, p.header_end, srpm.name as source_rpm, pg.name as package_group_name, cs.checksum, cs.checksum_type as checksum_type, prd.primary_xml as primary_xml, prd.filelist as filelist_xml, prd.other as other_xml FROM rhnChannelPackage cp, rhnPackage p LEFT OUTER JOIN rhnPackageGroup pg ON p.package_group = pg.id LEFT OUTER JOIN rhnSourceRpm srpm ON p.source_rpm_id = srpm.id LEFT JOIN rhnPackageRepodata prd ON prd.package_id = p.id, rhnPackageName pn, rhnPackageEvr pevr, rhnPackageArch pa, rhnChecksumView cs WHERE cp.package_id = p.id AND p.name_id = pn.id AND p.evr_id = pevr.id AND p.package_arch_id = pa.id AND cp.channel_id = :channel_id AND p.checksum_id = cs.id ORDER by 1

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_files
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version FROM rhnPackageFile pkgf, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgf.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgf.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_provides
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageProvides pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_requires
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageRequires pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_conflicts
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageConflicts pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_obsoletes
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageObsoletes pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_recommends
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageRecommends pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_suggests
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageSuggests pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_supplements
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageSupplements pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_capability_enhances
mode.query: SELECT pkgcap.id, pkgcap.name, pkgcap.version, pkgp.sense FROM rhnPackageEnhances pkgp, rhnPackageCapability pkgcap WHERE pkgp.capability_id = pkgcap.id AND pkgp.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: repomdgenerator_package_changelog
mode.query: SELECT pkglog.time, pkglog.name as author, pkglog.text FROM rhnPackageChangeLog pkglog WHERE pkglog.package_id = :package_id

mode.name: find_channel_in_task_queue
mode.query: SELECT task_data FROM rhnTaskQueue WHERE task_data = :cid AND task_name = 'update_errata_cache_by_channel'

write-mode.name: update_task_queue
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnTaskQueue SET earliest = :earliest WHERE task_data = :cid

write-mode.name: insert_into_task_queue
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnTaskQueue (org_id, task_name, task_data, priority, earliest) VALUES (:org_id, :task_data, :cid, 0, :earliest)

write-mode.name: delete_task
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnTaskQueue where org_id = :org_id and task_name = :name and task_data = :task_data and priority = :priority

mode.name: lookup_reboot_action_cleanup
mode.query: select sa.action_id, sa.server_id from rhnServerAction sa join rhnAction a on sa.action_id = a.id join rhnActionType at on a.action_type = at.id where sa.status = 1 and at.label = 'reboot.reboot' and pickup_time + numtodsinterval(:threshold, 'hour') < current_timestamp

mode.name: lookup_child_action
mode.query: select a.id from rhnAction a join rhnServerAction sa on sa.action_id = a.id where prerequisite = :action_id and sa.server_id = :server_id

mode.name: lookup_kickstart_session_id
mode.query: select ks.id from rhnKickstartSession ks where ( (ks.old_server_id = :server_id and ks.new_server_id is NULL) or ks.new_server_id = :server_id or ks.host_server_id = :server_id ) and ks.action_id = :action_id
